pullrequest.title: patch to allow parser_urdf to parse visual plugins

content.raw:
Looks OK to me.  At first I was put off by the use of `new` without a matching `delete` anywhere, suggesting a possible memory leak.  Then I saw that that happens a lot in in the URDF parser; ticket forthcoming.

@piyushk , when you get a chance, it would be nice to add a test for this functionality, probably to `src/parser_urdf_TEST.cc`.
content.html:
Looks OK to me. At first I was put off by the use of new without a matching delete anywhere, suggesting a possible memory leak. Then I saw that that happens a lot in in the URDF parser; ticket forthcoming.

@piyushk , when you get a chance, it would be nice to add a test for this functionality, probably to src/parser_urdf_TEST.cc.
